explains: n. 表现，显现；表现形式；（鬼魂或神灵）出现，显灵；示威运动

sentences.en: What Watson did was to observe muscular habits, because he viewed them as a manifestation of thinking.
sentences.cn: 沃森所做的就是观察肌肉习惯，因为他认为肌肉习惯是思考的表现形式。

sentences.en: Some manifestation of your concern would have been appreciated.
sentences.cn: 你当时要是表现出一些关心就好了。

sentences.en: The riots are a clear manifestation of the people's discontent.
sentences.cn: 骚乱清楚地表明了人们的不满情绪。
